91 预防 yùfáng prevention

141 热爱 rè'ài love

拼 pīn spell
拼的不是说当下大家拉了多量 pīn de bùshì shuō dāngxià dàjiā lāle duōliàng The fight is not to say that everyone has pulled a lot

着急 zhāojí in a hurry

却 què but
